## Matrix.copyToArray() method

Populates the given array from the starting index with the current matrix values

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyToArray(array: FloatArray, offset?: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the target array |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the target array where to start storing values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current matrix
